outputs.output_descr:
The objectives of the preparatory phase is to prepare full-size project document that meets the requirements of GEF, UNDP and is aligned with the needs of the Government of Azerbaijan. The preparatory phase activites include:
•	Detailed assessment of the institutional and legal environment at the national/regional levels with respect to forest and pastureland management
•	Assessment of the capacity of different agencies to support implementation of project activities
•	Baseline forest and pastureland management assessment in the project's pilot regions
•	Conduction of the feasibility analysis and preparation of the project document

project_descr: Sustainable Pasture and Forest Management in Greater Caucasus for improved management practices and carbon sequestration
project_title: Pasture and Forest Management in Greater Caucasus
